news.markdown:
**4/4 FOR _MAY-WE-GO-ROUND?_** in [Fest magazine](https://www.festmag.co.uk/theatre/103215-maywegoround): "exquisitely clever, technically stellar ... euphoric, and so infectious" . "Hilarious and witty: a joy" --- [The Skinny](http://www.theskinny.co.uk/festivals/edinburgh-fringe/theatre/dance-base-round-up-edinburgh-fringe-2016). "Laugh out loud ... a mixture of charisma and sheer will" --- [Total Theatre Magazine](http://totaltheatre.org.uk/the-hiccup-project-may-we-go-round/). "Touching, endearing and funny" --- [EdinburghGuide.com](http://www.edinburghguide.com/festival/2016/edinburghfringe/maywegorounddancebasereview-17119). "Choreographic candyfloss" --- [Ian Abbott](http://writingaboutdance.com/performance/ian-abbott-edinburgh-fringe-hiccup-project/).

**MAY-WE-GO-TO-EDINBURGH?** Many thanks to all who supported our successful Kickstarter campaign! _May-We-Go-Round?_ is at the Edinburgh Fringe. 

**5* REVIEW** for _“It’s okay, I’m dealing with it”_ at [FringeGuru](http://brighton.fringeguru.com/reviews/brighton-2016/its-okay-im-dealing-with-it).

MAY-WE-GO-TO-EDINBURGH? Many thanks to all who supported our successful Kickstarter campaign! May-We-Go-Round? is at the Edinburgh Fringe.

events.markdown:
**_May-We-Go-Round?_ at the Edinburgh Fringe 2016**
**9 -- 14 August** --- dancebase --- **[Tickets](http://www.dancebase.co.uk/festival-2016/may-we-go-round-717)**

**_May-We-Go-Round?_ Autumn tour 2016**
**14 October** --- Bath Spa Live, Bath Spa University
**11 November** --- Pegasus Theatre, Oxford --- **[Tickets](http://pegasustheatre.org.uk/?post_type=shows&p=9905)**
**22 November** --- Exeter Playhouse 
**25 November** --- Barbican Theatre, Plymouth --- **[Tickets](https://www.barbicantheatre.co.uk/event-details/?eid=34426)**
**7 December** --- Mumford Theatre, Anglia Ruskin University --- **[Tickets](http://www.anglia.ac.uk/arts-law-and-social-sciences/mumford-theatre/may-we-go-round)**
